org.modelio.gproject.module

Interface IModuleCatalog

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyModuleCatalog, FileModuleStore

    public interface IModuleCatalog
    Modules catalog.

    Allows to get a module handle from a .jmdac module archive.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<IModuleHandle> findAllModules(IModelioProgress monitor)
      Get all module handles available in the cache.
      IModuleHandle findModule(String moduleName, String moduleVersion, IModelioProgress monitor)
      Get a module handle from the cache.
      IModuleHandle getModuleHandle(Path archivePath, IModelioProgress monitor)
      Get a module handle from a .jmdac archive.
      void removeModule(IModuleHandle mh)
      Remove the module from the catalog.

    • Method Detail

      • getModuleHandle

        IModuleHandle getModuleHandle(Path archivePath,
                            IModelioProgress monitor)
                              throws IOException,
                                     FileSystemException
        Get a module handle from a .jmdac archive.
        Parameters:
        archivePath - the archive path
        monitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Returns:
        the module handle
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of error.
        FileSystemException - in case of file system error. Use FileUtils.getLocalizedMessage(FileSystemException) to get a human readable error message.

      • findModule

        IModuleHandle findModule(String moduleName,
                       String moduleVersion,
                       IModelioProgress monitor)
                         throws IOException,
                                FileSystemException
        Get a module handle from the cache.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - the module to find.
        moduleVersion - the version of the module to find. Might be null to indicate the latest available version.
        monitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Returns:
        the module handle
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure
        FileSystemException - in case of file system error. Use FileUtils.getLocalizedMessage(FileSystemException) to get a human readable error message.

      • findAllModules

        List<IModuleHandle> findAllModules(IModelioProgress monitor)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          FileSystemException
        Get all module handles available in the cache.
        Parameters:
        monitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Returns:
        a list of module handles
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure
        FileSystemException - in case of file system error. Use FileUtils.getLocalizedMessage(FileSystemException) to get a human readable error message.

      • removeModule

        void removeModule(IModuleHandle mh)
                  throws IOException,
                         FileSystemException
        Remove the module from the catalog.
        Parameters:
        mh - the module to remove.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure.
        FileSystemException - in case of file system error. Use FileUtils.getLocalizedMessage(FileSystemException) to get a human readable error message.
